name: My Isekai Dream
description:
Meet all the non-datable girls and then fight for the survival of a kingdom.

This game is in early access and lacks some functionality and gameplay, most notable is the lack of saving and loading. Also the world is pretty empty at the moment.

Play the game from start to finish in one sitting. Its not a long game.

In the RPG section, seek out the demon lord by going right and and making your way around to far above the palace.

Please comment any bugs found and any suggestions.

I hope you enjoy.
